author: Wayne Collins
method: Place the vodka, orange liqueur, lime juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake hard and then strain into a coupe glass or small Martini glass. Hold the piece of orange peel over the glass and carefully flame with a match. Garnish the cocktail with the flamed orange peel and serve.
ingredients: 35ml/1½fl oz vodka,  15ml/½fl oz orange liqueur,  squeeze fresh lime juice,  25ml/1fl oz cranberry juice,  twist orange peel, to garnish
